alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:41PM CDT until June 15 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montague County in north central Texas... Western Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1041 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bowie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowie, Nocona, Muenster, St. Jo, Lake Nocona, Lake Muenster, Nocona Hills, Montague, Prairie Point, Leo, Rosston, Fruitland, Bulcher, Capps Corner, Forestburg, Illinois Bend, Ringgold, Stoneburg, Belcherville and Mallard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
